::Spears::

She turned and looked at Striker.  She ran to his side and gently 
stroked his face.  Her love for him was the strongest thing she still 
had inside her.  Her one time weakness was now her greatest 
strength.  She held him and cried.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Well, even if it does control her completly you can still save 
her. 
> Find a way to kidnapp her, and than experiment to remove the chip. 
> Boom, she's back to normal.)
> 
> Prebon sent a com to Ignatius.
> 
> "Where have you put the prisoner?"
> 
> "Cell A7."
> 
> Prebon escorted Spears to the brig wing and found A7. It didn't 
have 
> bars; it was a steel door. They only way you could see was by 
opening 
> a peep hole. He opened and looked at Striker. Still unconsiuos, 
bound 
> in chains. He laughed.
> 
> "Come Spears, look! See how defeated your lover is!"
